item.title: Quick Way to Check for Url Redirects
item.description: Recently I had to go through a bunch of URLs and identify whether or not they redirect to another URL. Since the list was rather long (several hundred entries), I thought I should rather write a script to do this for me. I used the Requests library to make the initial request for a given URL. If the response code was 3XX, then I assumed it is being redirected. There are a couple of other edge cases (timeouts and generic connection errors, either due to non-existent domain, or network error) that the script attempts to cover for.
